member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_DESKTOP_IMAGE_INFO
member.summary: The DISPLAYCONFIG_DESKTOP_IMAGE_INFO structure contains information about the image displayed on the desktop.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_DESKTOP_IMAGE_INFO.PathSourceSize
member.summary: A structure that specifies the size of the VidPn source surface that is being displayed on the monitor.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_DESKTOP_IMAGE_INFO.DesktopImageRegion
member.summary: A structure that defines where the desktop image will be positioned within path source. Region must be completely inside the bounds of the path source size.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_DESKTOP_IMAGE_INFO.DesktopImageClip
member.summary: A structure that defines which part of the desktop image for this clone group will be displayed on this path. This currently must be set to the desktop size.
